xt:extension.xt:author: USEP (EM)
xt:extension.xt:name: US Epigraphy Encoding Form

body.h1: Encoding Forms for the US Epigraphy Projecdt
body.p: This is a form for encoding inscriptions using the Epidoc customization of the TEI schema created specifically for the conventions adopted by the US Epigraphy project. For more information see the US Epigraphy Project website.

pull down menus for controlled vocabularies now display all categories and sub-categories.
Content divs now are: Edition, Translation, Commentary, Apparatus
